pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo anācāraṁ ācarati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.7_0: “kiṁ nu kho nāma tumhe, āvuso, maṁ vattabbaṁ maññatha?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.11_0: Seyyathāpi nāma mahāvāto vāyanto tiṇakaṭṭhapaṇṇasaṭaṁ ekato ussāreyya, seyyathā vā pana nadī pabbateyyā saṅkhasevālapaṇakaṁ ekato ussāreyya;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.12_0: evameva tumhe nānānāmā nānāgottā nānājaccā nānākulā pabbajitā ekato ussāritā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.13_0: Kiṁ nu kho nāma tumhe, āvuso, maṁ vattabbaṁ maññatha?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.17_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.18_0: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.19_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ channaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.20_0: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, channa, bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karosī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.23_0: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.25_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.26.1_0: “Bhikkhu paneva dubbacajātiko hoti uddesapariyāpannesu sikkhāpadesu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karoti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.27_0: ‘mā maṁ āyasmanto kiñci avacuttha kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā, ahampāyasmante na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.30_0: ‘māyasmā attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ akāsi, vacanīyamevāyasmā attānaṁ karotu,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.31_0: āyasmāpi bhikkhū vadetu sahadhammena, bhikkhūpi āyasmantaṁ vakkhanti sahadhammena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.32_0: Evaṁ saṁvaddhā hi tassa bhagavato parisā yadidaṁ aññamaññavacanena aññamaññavuṭṭhāpanenā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.33_0: Evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.34_0: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamāno taṁ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṁ kusalaṁ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.2_0: dubbaco hoti dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgato akkhamo appadakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsaniṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.8_0: yaṁ bhagavatā paññattaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ, etaṁ sahadhammikaṁ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.10_0: “mā maṁ āyasmanto kiñci avacuttha kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā, ahampāyasmante na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.14_1: Ye passanti ye suṇanti tehi vattabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.17_0: Āyasmāpi bhikkhū vadetu sahadhammena, bhikkhūpi āyasmantaṁ vakkhanti sahadhammena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.18_0: Evaṁ saṁvaddhā hi tassa bhagavato parisā yadidaṁ aññamaññavacanena aññamaññavuṭṭhāpanenā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.35_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.37_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.40_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.42_0: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.43_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.48_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.50_0: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.51_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.53_0: Samanubhaṭṭho saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.59_0: Saṅghādisesaṁ ajjhāpajjantassa ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippassambhanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:3.1.1_0: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:3.1.2_0: Dhammakamme vematiko na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:3.1.3_0: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
